title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, October 21, 2020
description: It's the birthday of science fiction writer Ursula K. Le Guin (1929-2018), who said, "if...lack of motivation is a constant problem, perhaps writing is not your forte."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of science fiction writer Ursula K. Le Guin (1929-2018), who said, "if...lack of motivation is a constant problem, perhaps writing is not your forte."
